metadata.name: BAND Royalty Series 1: Vinyl Album #1/3000 Every Time It’s Played
metadata.description: BAND Royalty is your entrance into the music industry matrix, where we celebrate the diversity of music worldwide with beautifully curated limited-edition artwork, creating a truly inclusive platform that lets music lovers and fans take their enjoyment to the next level by offering blockchain-secured BAND NFTs that enable holders who stake their NFTs onto the BAND Royalty platform, the ability to potentially earn crypto from some of the world’s most popular songs and artists. The unique opportunity that is BAND Royalty enables individuals who stake BAND NFTs, a share in 50% of royalties from the expanding BAND music royalty collection, as a royalty income stream derived from every time that a song in the BAND Royalty music catalog is played or performed.
metadata.author: BAND Royalty
